stories.storyText:
[Code Name] Savage 
[Gender] Female 
[Combat Experience] 4 years 
[Place of Birth] Rim Billiton 
[Date of Birth] Jun. 30 
[Race] Cautus 
[Height] 160cm 
[Infection Status] 
Non-infected as confirmed by medical examination.

[Physical Strength] Excellent 
[Mobility] Standard 
[Physical Resilience] Excellent 
[Tactical Acumen] Normal 
[Combat Skill] Standard 
[Originium Arts Assimilation] Standard

Savage was originally part of Rim Billiton Mining Company's security forces. She was an exemplary agent, known for taking down hard targets and protecting key company executives. 
She now serves as a guard for a Rhodes Island combat squad.

Imaging tests on this Operator show clear outlines of internal organs, with no abnormal dark spots or shadows. No unusual traces of Originium particles present in the circulatory system, no signs of infection, confirming this operator as uninfected. 

[Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0% 
No Oripathy. 

[Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.15u/L 
Take care when performing missions. 

Savage is in incredibly good health. If only everyone could be as healthy as her...
--Medic Operator Hibiscus

Savage uses special Originium Arts in battle that detonate the ground struck by her hammer fractions of a second after impact. She has taken down difficult targets with these Arts.
After a reverse-engineering study on her hammer, the engineering staff found her hammer was not armed with a blasting device at all, but rather, it acted as an unconventional staff. Savage uses the Originium housed inside the hammer to create the blasts.
Although she doesn't fully understand the principles behind this power, when she is manipulating the hammer, she always unleashes tremendous explosive power. 
Other important information cannot be verified without further research.

Savage earned her codename thanks to the massive destruction she causes both in combat and on mining missions. The codename also matches her physique. 
However, despite her name, Savage is a fairly kind and cheerful Operator. She is known to be friendly, reliable, and fun both on and off the battlefield. 
Take not though, she is quite fierce when on the football field, so try not to yell at her while she's playing.

Savage plays a very important role in combat. She clears obstacles to facilitate direct attacks against the enemy. She is also quite effective at protecting her teammates, and casualties are almost always lower than expected with her on a mission.
Sometimes she likes to get in the kitchen and make vegetable soups, mushroom pies, and other Rim Billitonian cuisine for her fellow Operators.
Many Operators call her dishes comfort food.
She has been known to pitch in and help her teammates when she can, and she is increasingly well-liked.
Please do not post the names of suitors she has rejected on the bulletin board in the lounge. Thank you for your cooperation.

[Classified Log] I have already spoken with Savage, and she understands our current situation. It is an issue between her and the Doctor. 
At least Savage will fight for Amiya, and that is enough for now. 
I hope we have enough gumption to resolve this deadlock. 
--Kal'tsit

Savage made it clear she considers Amiya and Kal'tsit old-fashioned.
Savage also stated her identity shouldn't matter to Rhodes Island. She believes as long as she is helping her friends, what and where her mission takesheris unimportant.
She will probably continue to fight as the only one who truly knows her limits.

skins.description:
An outfit commonly worn by Operators.
While not as practical as a uniform, it's what they find most comfortable.

An outfit that has been improved after the Operator's Promotion.
Custom-made to suit each Operator's experiences and needs, these outfits are designed to provide them maximum flexibility on any battlefield. Furthermore, this is all done without compromising the comfort that they've come to expect.

<color name=#ffffff>Bloodline of Combat Collection/300 Metres Underground. Savage raises her lantern, her suit billowing in the abyss. Deeper in the darkness, graviton accelerators link in a loop, twinkling in unison. They have noticed her arrival.</color>

<color name=#ffffff>Rhodes Kitchen Collection/Secret Family Recipe. Savage wore this when making carrot cakes. The hand-knitted sleeves and an apron paired with a cool, breathable inner layer make it feel relaxing and distinctive.</color>

modules.desc:
Operator Savage has demonstrated a remarkable aptitude for swift and fierce enemy suppression in combat.
The Field Operations Department has thus passed the following resolution:
This operator shall be appointed a Guard Operator during field operations to exercise Centurion responsibilities.
In witness whereof,
This badge is hereby conferred upon the above named.

Mum's very cross with the big Cautus girl scratching her head in front of her.
'Trying to sneak out again! If you don't rest, I'll MAKE you rest, I'm warning you!'
Savage lifts away the giant basket of carrots perched atop her mum's head.
'Fresh, sweet, and crunchy! Just perfect for this trip's rations. I'll bring the leftover ones back, Mum, and then you can make carrot pie!'
Mum leaps up and gives Savage a few raps on the head. 'These are for you to rest up at home, and let your health come back to you!
'Ever since you came back from that abandoned mine all a muddle, it's like your motor's never stopped.
'If you're not banging on about how you met a ghost, then you're trying to run out of doors... Stuffing all our family plans, that's you. You've got me at wit's end.'
She can't possibly explain to her mother that that wasn't a ghost sighting, but on the other hand, it is true the mysterious stranger with the little rabbit hasn't left a trace for her to find.
It's as if whoever they were, they never existed in these lands at all.
How?
'You went somewhere, suddenly passed out, then the people who were with you all vanished into thin air.
'Ghost stories like that are a penny a piece for the workers here. That's just life in the mines.'
'They were NOT just ghosts haunting Rim Billy!'
Even though it was the briefest of encounters, Savage remembers the warmth of the girl curled up sleeping in her arms that evening. Moreover, when she spent every bit of her strength smashing apart boulders to rescue them from that collapsed mineshaft, the mysterious stranger clearly bled.
They never told her where their journey's destination lay, but when the mysterious stranger was alone, tightly wrapped in solemn silence, Savage knows she caught a glimpse of them gazing into the starry sky, and to lands far away.
Who could be waiting for them up ahead?
Savage doesn't know, but they need her help.
'Mum, I'm not going to make it! I still have to go to the maintenance crew and check if they've fixed my hammer yet!'
Her mother knows this passionate girl of hers. Ever since she was little, once she got fixated on something, she'd never let it go.
'Oi, you forgot to empty the letterbox again, it's been more than a week now. Honestly, you make me doubt if you can take care of yourself...'
But that letter Savage had ignored for days is what finally calms her down. Stuffed inside is a design, drawn by hand, for a weapon just for her—and in the corner is a doodle of three people. Plus, a note.
'Miss, pardon us for not saying goodbye. The Doctor is very sorry that you broke your weapon to help us.'
Putting the letter away, Savage lets out a deep breath. She absolutely can't wait to hit the road again.
A strong gut feeling tells her that in the end, they'll meet once again, and finish their journey.

missionList.desc: During battle, have Savage use Precise Blast a total of 10 times (excluding Support Units)
Clear Main Theme 4-5 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Savage, and can only include 4 other Operators as members

voice_lines.voiceText: Heheh, Dr. {@nickname}, What can I do for you today?
Combat missions take up most of my job, where I just havoc around with my hammer... It feels nice to get to sort files like this every once in a while.

When I worked for RIM Billiton, I was in charge of a lot of things: mining ores, doing geological surveys with electromagnets, all kinds of stuff. Hmm... sounds like a mouthful, right? To put it simply, I smashed what blocks the way and kept digging down!
Amiya has a lot on her shoulders. If only I could help share her burden a little... And perhaps yours too, Doctor. Don't hesitate to let me know if there's anything you need help with!
Providing cover, trailblazing, area denial... I might not be able to literally shield my teammates like the Defender Operators, but I can still protect everyone in my own way!
Did... did I manage to keep everyone safe?... *Sign of Relief* I'm so rapt... Please, Doctor, from now on, let me stay with you and Amiya!
Doctor, want a cabbage veggie salad with mushroom pies? Yep, I made three servings! Yours, mine, and another for Amiya. She loves the pies I make!

The running backs on the football field are unstoppable. They just keep charging forward in spite of everything, all to clear a path for their teammates. And then they just fall down and leave it to everyone else to finish the job. Isn't that sort of like what I do? It's very cool! I hope I don't have to get tackled though.

Doctor, as long as I get to stay with you and Amiya, it's enough for me. Memories belong in the past, while the future is waiting for us to color it in. Amiya and I will continue to create more memories with you in the days to come!
Doctor, seems you've got some time to spare... Then let's go get groceries for tea tonight!
Savage, from RIM Billiton, reporting for duty! The moment I got the message from you and Amiya, I rushed right over to see what I could do. Huh? You don't remember anything? Strewth!
Ooh, I see. Uh-huh… I totally understand it now!
I feel a lot better taking orders from you, Doctor. I won't let you down!
Don't worry, Doctor. No matter how many enemies there are, as long as you're with me, I'll smash 'em all!
Savage, in position!
Everyone, follow me closely!
Begin the attack!
Target located. Attack!
I'm ready!
What's next?
Leave it to me!
This one's mine!
Haaaa!
Mjolnir-3, full power!
Piece of cake!
Incoming!
Hmm, guess no mission's too difficult for us!
What? It's over already? Easy-peasy!
...I'd give my performance a C.
It's too dangerous here! We have to fall back!
Huh? You're really trusting me with work this detail-oriented?
Hmm? Nnngg?
All done with work for the day!
Arknights.
Happy New Year, Doctor! And also to you, Amiya, my little beaut~ Here's to the year you grow tall as a tree. And Doctor, here's to... augh, well, here's to a lighter workload! No more overtime!
Yahoo~ Doctor! Good morning!

Happy birthday, Doctor! I remember you used to love—oh, I bet you don't remember yourself, do you? Oh well, I'm sure you'll still love this butter and pulled-meat pie! It's the taste of a happy life. Amiya's words.

I'm a little dazed all of a sudden, seeing everyone at Rhodes Island so happy. After all we've been through, just having you and Amiya here, safe and sound, is already more than I could ask for. I'll be with you from here on out, fighting to preserve this happiness.

building_skills.desc: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Skill Summaries</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>70%</>

When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.35</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); furthermore, self Morale recovered per hour <@cc.vup>+0.35</>
